text: Bob Holiday (November 12, 1932 - January 27, 2017) was an American actor. He was best known for playing Superman in the Broadway musical It's a Bird, It's a Plane, It's Superman! (1966). He had the most appearances as Superman than any other actor, making over 140 performances. He was born in Brooklyn, New York. Holiday died on January 27, 2017, at his home in Hawley, Pennsylvania, aged 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Actors from Brooklyn Category:American stage actors
title: Bob Holiday
